replies.msg:
我想請問大家，因為我第一集只玩左少少，第二集完全冇玩過
所以今次我買左798個英文版all in one package
但入面有好多隻Game，我想請問一下
我該按什麼次序去玩?

時間線嚟講好似係

Birth By Sleep
0.2
I
Chain of Memory
358/2
II
Dream Drop Distance
III

謝謝你
但佢隻1.5+2.5 remix入面有
Kingdom Hearts Final Mix
Kingdom Hearts Re:Chain of Memories
King Hearts 358/2 Days
Kingdom Hearts II Final Mix
Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep Final Mix
Kingdom Hearts Re:coded

我想問
Kingdom Hearts Final Mix 係咪姐係 I 的高清版?
